name: Shadow Stepper
description:
Brackeys 2022 Game Jam submission (Theme: It is not real). 2 man crew.

***The Goggles are a Purple Sphere hidden in the starting area***

*****To get to the next level, walk into the wall at the end of each level towards the right side, strafe the wall until you activate it*****

You wake up in an abandoned arcade but suddenly realize this is no normal arcade.

Escape the Shadow Realm to return home...

Controls:

Move: WASD

Jump: SPACE

Look: Mouse

Toggle Goggles On/Off: Q

Toggle Flashlight On/Off: F

Pause Game: P
